FuncDef:
The flexe client-instance command creates a FlexE client and enters the created FlexE client.
The undo flexe client-instance command deletes the FlexE client.
By default, no FlexE client is created.
CLIs: flexe client-instance <clientindex> [ flexe-group <groupindex> flexe-type { cross | full-function } [ port-id <portid> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of FlexE client.
The value is an integer that from 1 to 65535.

Specifies the index of FlexE group.
The value is an integer that from 1 to 65535.

Specifies the id of FlexE port.
The value is an integer that varies according to subcards.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The flexe client-instance command is used to create a FlexE client or enter the created FlexE client.
